keys: antenne à demi onde de dipöle

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The radiation pattern from a vertical half-wave dipole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Strahlungsdiagramm von einem vertikalen 
Halbwellendipol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La configuration de rayonnement d'un dipöle à 
demi onde vertical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O teste padrão de radiação de um dipole de 
meia onda vertical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il modello di radiazione da un dipolo a semi onda
verticale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρότυπο ακτινοβολίας από ένα κάθετο δίπολο 
ημικυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El modelo de radiación de un dipolo de 
media-onda vertical</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the radiation pattern from a vertical half-wave dipole as viewed from above (a) and on a vertical elevation (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-wave dipole aerial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiated power distribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiation pattern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio-wave spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vertical half-wave dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen das Strahlungsdiagramm 
von einem vertikalen Halbwellendipol, wie von oben genanntem (a) und 
auf einem vertikalen Aufzug (b) angesehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la configuration de 
rayonnement d'un dipöle à demi onde vertical comme visualisé de (a)
ci-dessus et sur une altitude verticale (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram o teste padrão de 
radiação de um dipole de meia onda vertical como visto de (a) acima 
e em uma elevação vertical (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano il modello di 
radiazione da un dipolo a semi onda verticale come osservato da 
suddetto (a) e su un'altezza verticale (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν πρότυπο ακτινοβολίας
από ένα κάθετο δίπολο ημικυμάτων όπως εμφανίζεται από ανωτέρω
(α) και σε μια κάθετη ανύψωση (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran el modelo de 
radiación de un dipolo de media-onda vertical según lo visto de (a) 
antedicho y en una elevación vertical (b).</string>
          </description>
